name: True Colors (itch) (JakeLuce)
description:
In True Colors you must use your mouse to shoot the correct target. Both of the other entities spawn as the same color, but slowly drift toward their "true color". Shoot the entity with the correct "true color", and try to do it as fast as possible. I am writing this at 2 AM, so I apologize for the poor description and inevitable grammar mistakes.

CONTROLS

  • Mouse:        Aim
  • Left click:   Shoot
  • R:    Restart Level
